label: Cleaning and Hygiene Supplies
description: Products and services related to cleaning and hygiene, including equipment, tools, and supplies.
intents: Find cleaning supplies for home or office
Find hygiene products for personal or commercial use

subcategories.label: Cleaning Equipment
subcategories.description: Machines and tools used for cleaning floors, carpets, windows, and other surfaces.

subcategories.label: Cleaning Supplies
subcategories.description: Products used for cleaning surfaces, including chemicals, cloths, and mops.

subcategories.label: Hygiene Products
subcategories.description: Products used for personal or commercial hygiene, including soap dispensers, air dryers, and urinals.

subcategories.label: Waste Management
subcategories.description: Products and services related to waste disposal and recycling, including bins, bags, and incinerators.

subcategories.label: Janitorial Supplies
subcategories.description: Products and services used by janitors and cleaning professionals, including gloves, masks, and cleaning carts.
